sentences.en: A repetition of practices is the resort of gaining genuine knowledge.
sentences.cn: 反复实践是取得真知的方法.

sentences.en: Casual conversation tends to be filled with repetition.
sentences.cn: 随意的交谈中常常有许多重复的话.

sentences.en: Children used to learn by repetition.
sentences.cn: 过去小孩子是通过背诵来学习的。

sentences.en: Could a repetition of it be prevented?
He could also have cut out much of the repetition and thus saved many pages.
sentences.cn: 他原本也可以砍去许多重复的内容，从而缩减许多页。

sentences.en: He has a repetition of a previous talk.
He said it under his breath, torturing himself with the repetition.
sentences.cn: 他低声地说着, 一遍遍地说得自己很难受.

sentences.en: Her prose style is not always felicitous; she tends to repetition.
sentences.cn: 她的行文风格并非总是恰到好处，往往爱重复。

sentences.en: It is real prayer, and not mechanical repetition.
sentences.cn: 这是真正的祈祷，不是机械的重复。

sentences.en: No historical phenomenon is a mere repetition of the past.
sentences.cn: 任何历史现象都不会是简单的重复.

sentences.en: So much needless repetition makes the article long - winded.
sentences.cn: 这样叠床架屋,文章就太罗嗦了.

sentences.en: That is a mere repetition of what you said before.
sentences.cn: 那不过是重复了你以前讲的话.

sentences.en: The constant repetition of violence has blunted the human response to it.
sentences.cn: 反复出现的暴力事件使人们的反应都变得麻木了。

sentences.en: The repetition commonly involves specific sequences of lithologies.
sentences.cn: 这种重复通常包含特定的岩性顺序.

sentences.en: These are things which can not be staled by repetition.
sentences.cn: 这些东西不会因为重复而失去新意.

sentences.en: We do not want to see a repetition of last year's tragic events.
sentences.cn: 我们不想看到去年的悲剧重演。

words.tran_cn: [通信] 中继器；[通信] 转发器；重复者

trans.tran_cn: 重复，反复，背诵，复制品，副本，[乐]复唱，复奏，重奏
trans.tran_en: doing or saying the same thing many times
